if.test: (pStartYear != null and pStartYear != '') or (pEndYear != null and pEndYear != '')

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TB_INTEREST ( CORP_CODE ,CORP_NAME ,STOCK_CODE ,UESR_ID , CREATE_ID ,CREATE_DT ,CHANGE_ID ,CHANGE_DT ) VALUES ( #{CORP_CODE} ,#{CORP_NAME} ,#{STOCK_CODE} ,'SYSTEM_JB' , 'SYSTEM_JB' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') ,'SYSTEM_JB' ,TO_CHAR(SYSDATE,'YYYY-MM-DD') )
